command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user dtffFtxzpGHwBQ5.9f9e2b30cd53 --database HAWYZkdAU8mixfPXqdsPSj --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE article_meta_desc_tests;
messages: `articleType` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'magazine',
`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
stdout:
Table	Create Table
article_meta_desc_tests	CREATE TABLE `article_meta_desc_tests` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `articleSlug` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `articleType` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'magazine',
  `variantKey` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `metaDescription` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `isControl` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `isActive` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `impressions` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `clicks` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `totalReadTime` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `totalScrollDepth` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `completions` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_slug_variant` (`articleSlug`,`variantKey`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
